textAfterTable: Heather 07/31/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 21 out of 22 people found this review useful. 2 of 170 Categories Comments Great for these types of students This school is PERFECT for nursing students! Loyola's nursing program is in the 95th percentile for the NCLEX. Tips for prospective students Apply as soon as you possibly can if you think you might want to go to Loyola, this will help you get the most aid since scholarships are on a first come, first serve basis. Also, if you plan to attempt to get into the nursing program spots fill up quickly, so the sooner you apply the better. But you should keep one thought in mind academically, it is easy to get into Loyola but hard to stay. Loyola will continuously challenge you in order to bring out your best, however it will not be easy!
